statements: SELECT * FROM store_location;
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM store_location;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_location ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, ST_AsText(store_location) as location_text FROM store_location WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM store_location WHERE store_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM store_location WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, store_id FROM store_location WHERE store_id > 100 ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(store_id) AS total_stores FROM store_location;
SELECT store_name, ST_AsText(store_location) AS location FROM store_location WHERE ST_Distance(store_location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.335167 47.607268)')) < 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT store_name FROM store_location ORDER BY store_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT store_name, location FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT store_id, store_name, ST_X(store_location), ST_Y(store_location) FROM store_locations;
SELECT * FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC, store_id
SELECT store_name, ST_X(store_location), ST_Y(store_location) FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM store_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(store_location, (SELECT customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1), 100)
SELECT store_id, store_name, ST_Distance(store_location, 'POINT(5 5)') AS distance FROM store_locations ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT * FROM stores
SELECT name, location FROM stores WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM store_customers WHERE store_id = 2
SELECT store_id, customer_id, distance FROM radius_search_results ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT * FROM stores WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE id = 3
SELECT store_id, customer_id, distance FROM radius_search_results WHERE distance < 10 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT name, location FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT stores.name, customers.name, ST_AsText(stores.location) AS store_location, ST_AsText(customers.location) AS customer_location FROM stores JOIN store_customers ON stores.id = store_customers.store_id JOIN customers ON store_customers.customer_id = customers.id
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT query_name, search_radius FROM spatial_queries WHERE search_radius >= 10;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT store_name, ST_AsText(store_location) FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5
SELECT DISTINCT store_id FROM distance_metrics WHERE distance < 10.0
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date
